locality: Madagascar. Prov. Toamasina. Mantadia National Park, 140 km E of Antananarivo, 40 km E of Moramanga. On hilltop in rainforest. Low rosette of leaves on the ground. Corolla blue, anthers yellow
Andrambovato, à l'est de FianarantsoaForêt ombrophile sur latérite de gneiss

Madagascar. Antsirananana. Masoala National Park. Littoral forest just inside park boundary, 2 km W of Cap Est. - Prostrate forest floor herb. Leaves, calyx light whitish green. Corolla light blue-violet with a white center. Anthers yellow. Photo.
Brickaville, Maroseranana, Ambatolampy, Massif d'Ankerana. Forêt de Vohimanana.
Daraina, forêt de Binara. A 810 m du point côté 1138, au 38°.
Parc National de Ranomafana, parcelle III, summit of Maharira. Granite outcrop with pockets of moss forest in hollows. Plants preserved in alcohol. Collected with Raphael Rakoto.
Summit of quartzite massif of Ankirindro, ca. 25 air-km NW of Maroantsetra via the Antainambalana and then Vohimaro rivers. Collected with P.P. Lowry II, J. Rabenantoandro, R. Bernard & G. Modeste.
